title: Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart, Steel Mesh Removable Sides, 3 cu ft, 400 lb Capacity, Green
descriptions:
Introducing the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart, a versatile and durable solution for all your gardening needs! This stunning Green cart boasts a robust steel mesh frame, ensuring strength and longevity.

With quick assembly, you'll be up and running in no time. Removable side panels offer the flexibility to convert this cart into a flatbed, perfect for larger items or bulk materials.

Equipped with 10-inch pneumatic tires and a tight turn radius, maneuverability is a breeze. The ample ground clearance allows smooth transportation over various terrains. The 4-wheel design provides stability, making this cart an indispensable asset in your gardening arsenal.

Capable of carrying 400 lb or 3 cu ft of volume, this cart's capacity is second to none. Its bed dimensions of 34 inches by 18 inches provide ample space for all your gardening supplies.

Boasting a straight pull handle and weighing only 36.6 pounds, transporting the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM is effortless. Backed by a 1-year limited warranty, you can trust in its quality and reliability. Don't miss out on this must-have garden companion!

**Introducing the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart: Your Versatile and Durable Helper Around the Yard!**

Transform your gardening experience with the robust and versatile Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart. Built to last, this cart boasts a steel mesh frame that not only ensures durability but also offers the convenience of removable sides.

* **Quick Assembly**: Get started right away with no hassle thanks to its quick assembly design.
* **Convertible Design**: This multifunctional cart can be easily converted into a flatbed cart, making it an indispensable addition to your gardening toolkit.
* **Tight Turn Radius and Ample Ground Clearance**: Master maneuverability with the cart's tight turn radius, while its ample ground clearance lets you navigate uneven terrain without a hitch.
* **Durable 10-inch Pneumatic Tires**: The large and robust tires ensure smooth transportation of your gardening essentials, even on rough surfaces.
* **Ample Capacity**: With a capacity of 400 lb and a volume of 3 cu ft, this cart is capable of handling all your heaviest loads with ease.
* **Removable Side Panels and Straight Pull Handle**: The removable side panels offer flexibility for different tasks, while the straight pull handle ensures easy maneuvering.
* **1-Year Limited Warranty**: Peace of mind comes standard with every purchase, as this product is backed by a 1-year limited warranty.
* **Sleek and Attractive Green Color**: Not only does it perform, but the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM also looks great in your yard.

Join the countless gardeners who have already upgraded their gardening routines with the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart - order yours today and experience the difference!

Introducing the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart: your ultimate companion for all your outdoor projects! This robust, 400 lb capacity cart boasts a sturdy steel mesh frame that ensures durability and strength.

Easily assemble this convertible gem in minutes, switching from a sidewall cart to a flatbed one when the need arises. The removable side panels allow for versatility, while the 10-inch pneumatic tires provide excellent maneuverability with a tight turn radius and ample ground clearance.

Navigate through your garden or workspace with confidence thanks to its straight pull handle and 4-wheel design. With dimensions of 34 inches by 18 inches, this cart offers a generous 3 cubic feet volume to transport your goods.

Bringing it home? No worries - at just 36.6 pounds, the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM is lightweight enough for easy transportation while still being able to handle heavy loads. Backed by a 1-year limited warranty and available in a vibrant green color, this garden cart is an irresistible addition to your gardening essentials. Order yours today!
